https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nCfwCzWAOoGFGO3TtTtOWDu1oOD.jpg Komboodhi is the leader of a tribe that steals from the rich to survive. He befriends Varipuli, unaware of his past, only to learn that his village has been hunting him to offer his life to god. Aravaan
